## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | This order size covers the forecasted demand for the next 5 days with a safety margin, considering potential fluctuations. It utilizes two available vendor order quantities (2 x 10,000 units), minimizing potential waste from exceeding shelf life. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is 4,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, providing a greater buffer against demand fluctuations. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.7 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.8 days                                  |
| Comments                          | Ordering 20,000 units instead of 24,000 units ensures a more balanced stock level, preventing potential overstocking and minimizing waste while maintaining sufficient buffer against demand variability. |
